Name: The Maze
About the game: The Maze is a giant maze puzzle. You join the journey of Esmerelda and Zaf as they embark on the task of finding keys and the way out. If you enjoy a good maze then this will be the challenge you are looking for. Art on the walls will help you keep track of where you have been. The Puzzle King will taunt you and you'll get to hear the some conversations between E and Z. The Maze is part of the Puzzle Kings Playground Series.
